alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista; Ida (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 16 at 11:31AM CDT until March 17 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Additional snow accumulations near 1 to 2 inches remain possible. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Buena Vista and Ida Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 1 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
